text: Seyed Pendar Toufighi (born 10 June 1972) is an Iranian football administrator and Oil and gas industry activist.https://www.farsnews.com/news/13970322000050 He is a former member of the board of directors of Esteghlal Football Club. == References == == Other website == * * Category:Living people Category:1972 births
title: Seyed Pendar Toufighi
